headline.text: Maryland basketball’s Kaila Charles earns AP Preseason All-American honors

article1.author: Gus Martin
article1.blurb:
Maryland women’s basketball forward Kaila Charles is a Preseason All-American, the Associated Press announced Thursday, adding yet another honor to her resume leading into the 2019-2020 season.

The senior is the first Maryland player named to the Preseason All-American team since Alyssa Thomas in 2013.

headline.text: Maryland women’s soccer forward Alyssa Poarch named to All-Big Ten second team

article2.author: Jacob Richman
article2.blurb:
Maryland women’s soccer forward Alyssa Poarch was named to the All-Big Ten second team, the conference announced Thursday.

Poarch is the Terps’ top goal-scorer this season, with eight tallies to her name. The redshirt sophomore also tacked on three assists while starting every game for Maryland.
